name: Premises from which tuberculous cattle removed to be disinfected
text: §142-20  Premises from which tuberculous cattle removed to be disinfected.  Any premises upon which have been kept animals affected with tuberculosis shall be disinfected promptly after the removal of the animals and in a manner satisfactory to the department of agriculture and at the expense of the owner. [L 1923, c 124, §5; RL 1925, §630; RL 1935, §226; RL 1945, §1080; RL 1955, §20-21; am L Sp 1959 2d, c 1, §22; am L 1961, c 132, §2; HRS §142-20]
